column1: Naik claimed this in a press conference held at his private residence near Panaji and also reiterated to Deccan Herald subsequently over the phone, that one Dr. Mathai who runs SOUKYA, a holistic health care center, in Bengaluru had informed him about curing Prince Charles of COVID-19 using alternative medicine techniques. However, a spokesperson of the Clarence House, issued a denial to Deccan Herald stating, This information is incorrect. The Prince of Wales followed the medical advice of the NHS in the UK  and nothing more.
